SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my body's blood!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Oh dear. This door is a gravestone,
which means I'm emerging from a grave?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
My master lives once more! All hail
the Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here
and now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Hmm. You look rather...different, but are
undoubtedly my master! More blessings from
the Dismal King, to be certain. Now rest easy, for I, Dolores,
shall serve you as we work to
restore the Dismal King himself!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Aye, that would be lovely.
Two questions, though: Who are you,
and who is the Dismal King?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Goodness! It seems this resurrection
has left your memory scrambled. But worry not, for I, your loyal servant
Dolores, will aid you with anything
and everything your heart desires.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Oh, well, cheers for that.
My name is—

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Oh! How strange it is for you to introduce
yourself to me, Master! Also, sort of...
disturbing, I guess? Thankfully, we just need a little shock
to the system to restore those memories,
so let's go see the wardens of the
watchtowers who took your life!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
My memory? Hmm, perhaps this pertains
to my lost internal data? In that case,
this 'Dismal King' person may have some
sort of involvement with my heart.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Come, Master!
The first tower awaits!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.text:
Oh! How strange it is for you to introduce
yourself to me, Master! Well, if we want to
get your memories back, there's no choice
but to retrace your steps. And while I understand your being hesitant
to remember the moment you were brutally
beheaded, there's, um...not really another
option. Sorry!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.text:
Time to get going, then!
We're off to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my precious ring, which I offer
now unto the Well of Desires!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, but there's a reddish-black circle
over there that's calling to me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Ah, seems I'm inside a well, then.
And the circle I saw was this ring?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
My master lives once more! All hail the
Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here and
now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
It guided me here safe and sound,
so cheers for that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Love...? No, Master! I am your loyal servant,
Dolores! Did the shock of being so brutally
murdered truly make you forget!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I'm afraid I've no idea
what ye are on about.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Greedy_Man
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Well, well! If it ain't Dolores! Bet I'd be
sittin' pretty with the wardens of the
watchtowers if I were to capture ya!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bloodthirsty_Woman
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, she caused a commotion at the towers,
all right—but I bet we'd be sittin' even
PRETTIER if we also gave 'em the weirdo
who just popped out of the well!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Is that referring to me, then?
Terribly sorry if I'm weird.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, but this is grim indeed, Master!
These foul people intend to sell you
off to the wardens of the watchtowers!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I cannae claim to understand what's
happening here, but I suppose I've
no choice but to fight.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Greedy_Man
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Just climbed out of a well and already
lookin' for a fight? Well, bring it on,
'cause I'll put ya right back in the
ground where ya came from!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bloodthirsty_Woman
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Corpse pays as much as a prisoner,
so let's just kill 'em all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Goodness, what was that all about? 
I only came here seeking my heart.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
In that case, Master, let's go to the
watchtowers and claim the keys to the
Dark Castle! This will all be resolved once
the Dismal King is restored, you see.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
And this Dismal King fellow
has something to do with
my heart, then? Very well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
I can feel something in these ruins,
and each time I pray to the Dismal
King, the feeling becomes stronger.
Something...is coming.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Oh, but it's dark as anything in here—
and there's debris strewn about all over. Seems I've landed in some kind of ruins.
But I hear a voice over there, so probably
best have a look about and see what I find.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
My master is returned to me!
Huzzah! All hail the Dismal King!
I, Dolores, swear here and now
that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Ye must be the voice I heard, love!
I relied on it to find my way here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Oh, I am not the one responsible, Master.
I implored the Dismal King every day,
and he at last saw fit to hear my prayers.
He made it so you would hear my voice!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
So when ye say 'master,' do ye mean me?
Because if so, I think there may be some
sort of misunderstanding. Also, who is
this Dismal King ye are so on about?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
...What are you talking about, Master?
Ah, I see! The shock of being brought back
to life must have you confused. I understand,
and do not worry, for Dolores is at your side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Oh, cheers for that, love. I've no data for
this world, so that would be most helpful.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Let's start by heading for the Dark Castle
where the Dismal King resides. We won't
be able to get inside, but I still want to
offer up some words of thanks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
I wonder if perhaps this Dismal King
has something to do with my heart.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text: This is the Dark Castle, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
O Dismal King, thank you for returning my
master to me! I beg of you, please wait
just a little longer, that we might see you
restored to your former glory once more!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text: This is some kind of seal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
It appears the seal can be broken
by inserting something in here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Correct, Master! Each of the four wardens
of the watchtowers has hidden a key—
keys you died trying to acquire.
Er... Do you remember that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh dear. So these wardens each reside
in one of those towers, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
And they are all terrible fiends to the last!
So while we must get the keys from them,
we should avoid any head-on clashes.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text: Aye, I'll take it slow and steady.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.text:
They are all terrible louts to the last.
And since we need the keys anyway,
we should go kill every last one
of the miserable dastards!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.text:
Ye seem rather given
to conflict, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
I sit at the cusp of death, so starved am I!
Have you no thoughts at all as you gaze
upon my sallow, emaciated form?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
B-but we slaughtered an entire pig so
you might eat, milord! 'Tis all we had!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
You believe such a trifle could restore
my body to its full robustness? Pah! Well, if there is naught else to eat,
I've no choice but to consume you.
Though I'd hoped for something rather
more nutritious...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Begging your pardon, milord, but I am
with child. I beg of you, spare us
from the stewpot until he is born.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
A BABY!? Why didn't you fools
lead with that!? I will spare you today—but you must bring me
the child as soon as it is born. For unlike
the tough, bitter skins of adults,
newborn babe is soft and tender.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, thank the heavens!
We survived another month.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
I wonder what my next tribute will be.
Pah! I am mere moments from wasting
away to skin and bone!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
That's the Warden of Gluttony, one of the
watchtower wardens with a key to the Dark
Castle. Despite eating everything he can get
his hands on, he's constantly hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
And I was destroyed attempting to take the
key from him, aye? I'll have to be careful
not to let that happen again in the future.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. No. You're just going to
get killed again if we walk right
into the place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
But if the key is inside, there's nothing
for it except to go in there and get it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
How gallant you are, Master! I mean,
it's a stupid way to go about things,
but I rather like that about you.
Now lead on and I shall follow!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
EEEK! Please, spare our miserable lives!
We've nothing else to give, I swear!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Do ye know anything about the Warden
of Gluttony? We're looking for his key
to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
A key to... Wait, are you trying to help
the Dismal King!? Oh, bless you, madam!
If he were back, we'd no longer have to
toil under the cruel yoke of the wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Alas, I fear we know very little about the
Warden of Gluttony save that his hunger
cannot be slaked and he hoards more food
than any being could possibly consume.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, and he also enjoys uncommon food,
especially if he's never tasted it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Large quantities of food or some manner
of unusual food might get us into the tower,
is it? Cheers for that most valuable information.
And, well... Do try to take care of yourselves.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Let's just forget we even met them.
It will be better that way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Do ye know where we might find either
large quantities of food or some kind
of odd food, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
There's a livestock farm at the far end
of this town where meat is plentiful.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: Oh, but I detect no life signs here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Crivens, they're all dead! What could
have killed all these poor piggies?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Sadly, the plague is ever spreading.
If not for your sake, Master,
I'd never come to such a place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Ah. Plague, is it? Well then,
might we have these pigs?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, you WANT them? Well, that's the
best damn news I've heard all week!
Take 'em all! But for god's sake, don't eat the things.
They'll kill you ten times before you
even hit the ground.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, that's all right, love.
I don't eat.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
So we feed the dead pigs
to the Warden of Gluttony?
A brilliant plan, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Guess we'd best haul these dead
piggies over to the tower, then.
Shame there's no time to make
proper bangers out of them.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, we're at the Tower of Gluttony.
What next, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: I hide in the meat and sneak inside.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: We offer the meat and negotiate.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: Now let's go.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
I will go anywhere you go, Master!
Even inside a rotting, diseased,
squishy pig corpse!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
The Warden of Gluttony is not one for
negotiation, Master; I fear this plan
will end with your death once again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Is that so? My calculations have our chances
of success more likely than not, but perhaps
it would be best to reconsider?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, if your calculations say so,
Master, then we should go with that.
You could never be mistaken, after all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Ah, I see my next offering has come.
Now what awaits me this day? Can it be!? Rotten meat—and in such great
quantities! Oh, but tonight will be an
evening of bliss for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
*chomp* *munch* *horf* *snarfle*
This smell! This flavor! This texture!
Nothing in all the world can match it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
We should look for the key while
he's busy with all that dead pig.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Did the couple from before send this?
I may have underestimated them—the
foul rottenness of this meal is truly
a thing beyond all compare!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
And what a feast! I eat and eat and eat,
but there is yet more! Oho ho ho!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: I found the key, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
That big fellow there is still quite busy
with all of his eating, so let's you and
me slip away while we can.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text: I brought ye an offering, Warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Rotten meat—and in such great quantities!
Oh, but you are a fine one indeed—
and such dedication deserves a reward.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Nae nae, I require nothing.
Ye just go on and help yourself.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Why, I'm liking you more and more!
If only everyone was so thoughtful. But instead, I find myself surrounded by
cretins and fools who simply refuse to
understand or anticipate my needs! Also, this meat is simply divine.
I've never tasted its like before.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
'Tis the flesh of poor piggies
who died from disease.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
PLAGUEMEAT!? Oho ho ho ho!
How truly succulent!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
I'd no idea there were people about
who actually enjoyed rotten meat.
He truly is the Warden of Gluttony.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Now that you're full, love, I was wondering
if ye might be willing to hand over your key
to the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Strange... There was an idiot who died trying
to collect all the keys a little while ago.
Are you perhaps associated with that moron?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Well, either way, my key will do you no good
without the other three, so I'll let the other
wardens worry about that while I gorge myself
on this positively mouth-watering meat! The key is yours.
Best of luck, now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Ah, while your meal was mouth-watering,
I can't simply hand my key over to anyone
who wanders by with diseased meat. Sadly, I suppose there's nothing for it
but to kill you—but this little workout
will make my next meal all the sweeter!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
This is a well. Might we obtain
unusual food from here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, indeed! In fact, this well will let you
get your hands on food that would never be
found in this world otherwise. Oh, and sometimes you'll find garbage,
though I imagine the Warden of Gluttony
doesn't really care which one he gets.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Ah, so this world may connect to others.
Guess I'll give it a go, then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, I've caught something!
Let's pull it up.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh! An item, is it?
Suppose I'll take it with me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
This looks like it could work
as an offering to the warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text: I brought ye an offering, Warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Now THERE'S something I've never seen...
Why, it looks positively delicious!
Give it to me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh ho, but it simply melts in the mouth!
While food is best savored in one's stomach,
I am hardly one to shake a stick at doing so
on the tongue as well. Now then, I believe you've earned
a reward for bringing me something so
unusual and delicious.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Now that you're full, love, I was wondering
if ye might be willing to hand over your
key to the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Do you truly believe this meal was
valuable enough to warrant my key?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, I like you. I didn't think there was
anyone else in this world who understood
food on the same level as myself, but then
you arrived with the soul of a gourmand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Very well, you may have my key. Be aware,
however, it won't do you any good without
the other three—and I don't expect the other
wardens to be so generous as I. But that is their problem! As for myself,
I shall now immerse myself even further
into a world of succulent gourmets!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Hubris! Cheek! Impudence!
No meal could possibly be so valuable! Sadly, I suppose there's nothing for it
but to kill you—but this little workout
will make my next meal all the sweeter!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Wee question for you, love: why did ye
lock the Dismal King in the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
And who are you to be asking such things!?
If you would speak with me, manners and protocol
dictate that you must provide tribute in the
form of delicious foodstuffs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You there! Maid! You look terribly familiar...
Were you not the servant of the woman who
came here to steal the key to the Dark Castle?
The woman we later decapitated?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
My master lives again thanks to the power of
the Dismal King—and this time, we are going
to take the key and use it to release him!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
The Dismal King brought her back?
No. Impossible. Absolutely impossible! What's more, the Dismal King has locked
HIMSELF up in the Dark Castle—we are
simply taking guardianship of the keys
so as to ensure he is not disturbed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
A bald-faced lie! I know the keys have
been scattered and hidden away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Might you be willing to let me have
your key, then? I've something I'd
like to ask the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I am not in the habit of giving anything
to interlopers who arrive before me
without proper tribute! And so, I propose a challenge.
If you win, I'll give you the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Aye, name your terms.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
It will be a battle of the bulging belly!
We shall eat and eat and eat, and the side
who eats the most shall be declared victor!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
The Warden of Gluttony wants an
EATING contest!? That's just low.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
This is the Tower of Gluttony!
What other challenge would you
expect given our current setting? Oh, and if you lose, your lives will
be most deliciously forfeited to me.
Now...I would have your answer.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: HERO
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Aye, that sounds grand.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: HERO
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Nae, I think I'll just take the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Seems I've no other choice if I
want that key, so all right.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Lacking a bit in confidence, that one.
Only natural, of course, for one such
as she could never prevail against me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Are you certain about this, Master?
Think about who your opponent is!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Oh dear, this is a proper mess—
this body of mine cannae even eat!
I'm afraid you're gonna have to
stand in for me, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
It's a maid's duty to step in and
help when her master is in trouble.
But don't worry, I have an idea!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.text:
My key was stolen, but no matter. Right now,
I must focus on eating something to heal
the wounds upon my mind and body.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
There are lots of people in this town,
and none of them have the will to oppose
the warden—which is why they're always
one step away from starvation. But with a pronouncement from you,
Master, I'm sure this will go well!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Do ye think? I'm not terribly certain
that's true, but I'll give it a go.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Oh, please lend an ear, good people!
There's gonna be a feast at the Tower
of Gluttony, and all of ye are more
than welcome to come eat your fill.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
That pig of a warden is holding
a feast for US? I can't believe it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Aye, but the feast ends when the food's
gone, so better get a wiggle on.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: I'm in!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Me too!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Hey, wait for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Oh, but that was brilliant, love!
I think we might actually win now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ah, welcome! I commend you for standing
and fighting our battle even though it 
is destined to end with you in my belly.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I cannae say I'd make a particularly
delicious meal, but aye, let's begin.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Whoooa, look at all that food! I had no
idea the warden had such generosity!
NOW LET ME AT IT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ho, what are you doing!?
This is a one-on-one battle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
No, you never said this was one-on-one.
But I guess you can forfeit if you don't think
you can hack it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You deceived me...but it is no matter!
For I am the Warden of Gluttony,
and none can hope to best me on
the battlefield of food!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: This looks amazing!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: I'm gonna eat till I croak!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Hmph! You people are mere food tourists!
A hundred of you filthy urchins could not
outeat true food nobility such as myself!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
This is the first time I've ever eaten
so much, and I'm so happy I could die.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Not me! I want dessert! DESSEEERT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: My compliments to the chef!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Why not just give up already?
I have barely begun to dine!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Oh, splendid! Looks like the feast is going
to continue. We've had a hundred people eat
already, but there are still 300 more outside
awaiting their turn.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Y-yes, well, I could eat three TIMES
this amount with...no problem...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Pure dead brilliant that ye ate enough food
for 300 people, Warden! Oh, but ye don't look
so good, and we've still a hundred people
remaining. Do ye wish to continue?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I've only...begun to feast...
I...I will devour...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Oh dear. Probably best
to just give up, then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Don't make me lau— HURK!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: We won—and we got the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: It's all thanks to ye, love. Cheers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I couldn't be happier to have
been of use to you, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I hear you two were married in secret.
Congratulations! From two lives,
a new one is created. But why keep such a
wondrous thing secret?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You didn't want to pay the marriage tax.
Ah, but it's a pity to tarnish the sacred
act of marriage with such behavior. Still, I am a forgiving man. Your marriage
will be considered legal and binding so
long as you pay the tax by this evening.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Um, and by marriage tax,
do you mean...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
One night of service to me, yes.
The bride? The groom? Both? I care not.
You're free to make that decision yourselves.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I COULD order you to do this, as one cannot
oppose the power of a warden. But this service
is sacred, and coercion is an ugly thing that
does not suit me. Think carefully upon your decision.
I shall be waiting.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And now to decide what kind of service
they shall provide... Oh, just thinking
about it gives me chills! Hss hss hss!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That's the Warden of Lust, Master.
While he tries to hold a polite and
composed facade, his head is filled
with all manner of desirous thoughts. He's also one of the watchtower wardens
who holds a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
And I was destroyed attempting to take the
key from him, aye? I'll have to be careful
not to let that happen again in the future.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. No. You're just going to
get killed again if we walk right
into the place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Well, we might be able to get in the tower
and find the key if we say we're there to
pay the marriage tax like those other folks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Marriage... W-wait, you mean ME!? I mean, US!?
The two of us, a happily married couple!?
That's... Oh, but what am I to do!?
My mind is a complete blank...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
There's no precedent for a machine and a
human getting married, but why is that?
Also, what even is marriage, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Hello there, Warden.
We've come to pay the marriage tax.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
What!? I had no idea there were
people out there who might pay
my tax of their own volition!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Er, forgive me. I was so overjoyed to find people
who understand and appreciate the true meaning
of the marriage tax that I couldn't help but
exclaim in surprise. I offer my blessings unto your union, and am
glad you understand that the marriage tax
is a gift from me to the pair of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
The tax is a gift? Isn't it actually
a single night's service to you?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Indeed—and perhaps I'll accept that
service from your beautiful bride...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Looks like I'm up.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Come, my lovely. This way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Find the key quickly... Please.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Ta, love. Take care now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Now to look for the key.
Where should I start?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage on the right.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage on the left.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage straight ahead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh, I'm not detecting anything
here that might be a key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Ach. Still nothing. I need to find
the key and hurry back to Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh dear. Seems the key is probably
hidden on the warden's person.
I'd best hurry back.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Now then, my dear, let me see
that beautiful body of yours.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Beautiful? Me? Oh, no sir!
Just a plain old body over here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Why, that's not true at all!
The body of each and every
bride is a beautiful thing.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
So you're saying I'm exactly the same as all
the other brides!? You brought me all the
way up here and THAT'S what you tell me!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I... Er, I mean... Of course not!
You are wholly unique and special!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Ugh! This woman is a real pain.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Perhaps a drink, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Don't mind if I do!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: You must feel better now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh, that was just delicious.
I'll have another, please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Er... I mean, of course!
Have as many as you like!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: This one's not normal...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I did not realize you were the
troublesome type, my dear one.
I prefer a more...obedient bride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Well, if I'm not what you're looking for,
I suppose I'll just chalk this all up to
irreconcilable differences and head home.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
All right, this has gone on long enough!
I command you to gaze into my eyes,
and beg for my favor!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
No way! Not interested in staring
into your beady little eyes, mister!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Ah, but closing your eyes is futile...
You cannot escape my power...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: M-Master...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Oh, but I can escape it. I very, very much can.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Henchman_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Halt, stranger! I'm under strict
orders not to let anyone into the
warden's private chambers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Oh, now this just won't do!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: What's with all the commotion?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Are ye all right, love!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Yes, Master, I'm perfectly fine!
Did you find the key to the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
The key to the... Hss hss hss! Oh, but it's
all coming together now. I KNEW I recognized
this bride—you're that maid from before!
But your master is said to be deceased.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
By the power of the Dismal King has she
been returned to life—and we'll be taking
that key so we can aid in his return!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Hsss hsss hsss! Oh, how VERY interesting!
But let us discuss this like civilized people—
what do you need the key for? Depending on your answer,
I just might let you have it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: I'm looking for something.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: You'll pay for what ye did to Dolores!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I'm searching for my heart, and I think
this Dismal King fella may know something
about where to find it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
How utterly fascinating. This sounds far
more fun than any service which that maid
or bride or...whatever she is might offer.
You may take the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I'm quite looking forward to what you
will encounter in the Dark Castle...
Now begone before I change my mind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: So what's their story, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_100_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_100_C.text:
I'm surprised that woman lost her temper
over my treatment of a maid. Who IS she?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is the Month of Slumber, my good man—
yet a little bird tells me you have been
laboring the days away instead of sleeping
as you should be. Why is this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm sorry, milord! It's just that...
Well, we're out of food and we're hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text: Are you some kind of fool? You're hungry because you're laboring! Why, oh why, does my sacred rest have to be disturbed by packs of idiots like this? It! Is! So! Infuriating!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
But very well! If you desire to toil so badly,
I'll put you to work in the underground mines.
Your shift runs from midnight to midnight,
every day, until you are dead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, no! Please! I'll never work again!
I'll be a regular layabout! Please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
There can be no clemency for one
who disturbs my slumber. *yaaawn*

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
That is the Warden of Sloth, Master.
He's truly lazy, but doesn't mind
putting others to work. He's also one of the watchtower wardens
with a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
And I was destroyed attempting to take the
key from him, aye? I'll have to be careful
not to let that happen again in the future.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: We have to help that man.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. No. You're just going to
get killed again if we walk right
into the place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
But if the key is inside, there's nothing
for it except to go in there and get it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
I know you must have some kind of plan
in mind, Master, so very well! Let's try
to steal the key from the Tower of Sloth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Now hold on there, love. I know people may
not have to work during the Month of Slumber,
but surely doing so isn't strictly forbidden?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
The Warden of Sloth has done us a great service
by establishing a month in which none may toil.
The wasting of this blessing is an act that
cannot be permitted to stand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: Aye, but that's not specifically listed as a rule, is it?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
If a person is so insistent on besmirching
the Month of Slumber, they may pursue their
precious work in the underground mines. Those who wish to rest may sleep.
Those who wish to work will labor.
Such is the compassion of the Warden!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
So work IS permitted, then?
Aye, then there's no problem.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
What? No! You have to help me!
That's why you're here, right?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Aye, and I came here to do just that,
but it seems like it's unnecessary.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait! I know the Warden's weaknesses!
C'mon, PLEASE help me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: You can't possibly trust this guy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: Nae, we're going. Sorry to interrupt.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Come then, my pretty! Oh, but you will
SO enjoy the underground mines!
Aha! Aha! Aaah ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Let's infiltrate the Tower of Sloth
and search for the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text: So what's the warden's weakness, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
The Warden of Sloth has no weaknesses!
And even if he did, there's no way a lowborn
oaf like me would know anything.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text: Let's send this liar to the mines.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
Oh, that's some valuable information.
Cheers, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
In that case, it's time to take my leave.
Oh, and while I don't know what you're
planning, I wish you the best of luck!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text: Let's go to the Tower of Sloth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
I suppose I should have warned them that
entering the tower will make them sleepy...
but after the way they almost abandoned me,
I think they've earned a little suffering!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Even the guard's asleep.
The Month of Slumber, indeed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
*yaaawn* Forgive me, Master...
I'm getting a bit tired...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Not enough sleep? Oh dear.
Let's hurry to the warden's room.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: I love how you play dirty, Master.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: We can take the key now, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
You were a fool to attack me in my sleep,
for it is when the Warden of Sloth is at
his most powerful—and by that, I mean
I am completely invincible!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Aye—but that means ye aren't
invincible right now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
I had no reason to fight for true.
Now back to sleep for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
The Warden of Sloth dislikes loud noises,
then. How loud must it be, I wonder?
Perhaps 120 decibels or so would do it?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: If I may, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: *inhaaaaaale*

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
WAR WITH THE WARDEN! WAKE UP SLOTH!
WAR WITH THE WARDEN! I'M YOUR NEW BOSS!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Gyaaa! What is this horrific sound!?
This death growl in my head!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
DEATH AND BLOOD AND GRAVES AND BRAINS!
NOW YOUR SOUL HAS GONE INSAAAANE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
The goddess of death herself has come!
My soul is being torn from my body!
And yet I burn to hear more! More!
MOOOOOOOOOOOORE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: He fainted! Well, isn't that a sight?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: My voice was that captivating?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: Let's take the key, then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Your singing appears to have
awakened everyone, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
We got the key thanks to you,
Dolores. Cheers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: Did you like my singing, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: Oh, but it was grand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: That was right wicked, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: Your singing was wonderful, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
I hope you'll be able to hear
my own song of love someday.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
If you liked that, I bet you'll enjoy this
death metal medley even more!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
I think I'd enjoy singing
as freely as you do.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
I'll perform a duet with you
any time, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
I appreciate it, love, but I'm afraid
such a thing isn't possible for me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
As this month's grand tournament winner,
your prize is a one-on-one battle with me!
NOW COME AT ME, SON!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
B-but you're the Warden, milord!
There's no way I can beat you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
One blow? Seriously!? How could a weakling like
that have possibly won the grand tournament!?
Who in the blazes is running that thing!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Henchman_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Er, me, milord. But the thing is,
we don't have many participants
because no one wants to face y—

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text: Then it's your job to FIND SOME!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Lasted two blows, did ya?
I sure know how to pick 'em! ...Well, crap. I let my anger get the best
of me, and now I'm down a lackey. Again.
Grrr, but that really fries my eggs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That is the Warden of Wrath. He's constantly 
furious, and ever in search of intense combat.
He's also one of the watchtower wardens
with a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
And I was destroyed attempting to take the
key from him, aye? I'll have to be careful
not to let that happen again in the future.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
It's really not like you to fight
someone so obsessed with battle.
Couldn't we try to take advantage
of his short fuse or something?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Aye, I might be able to do something like that.
But if ye think an outright fight is a poor idea,
we'll try something else.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: I've come to fight ye, Warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It's about damn time somebody interesting
showed up around here! Let's just hope
you aren't all talk.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
And if I win, ye have to give me 
your key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Agreed. And if I win,
you give me your LIFE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Looks like you're stronger than I thought.
I'll do you a solid and actually put some
effort into this next one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Ye won't defeat me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Run away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Dolores is right: we should look
for another way to get the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Running away, is it? Good! I love hunting
down fleeing prey—and I'll hunt ya to the
ends of the damn world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Takin' off? Good! Get stronger,
then come back! More fun for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It might be more prudent to acquire
a key from a different tower first.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
You're making this a good workout
for me—and the key you seek is
within that flame.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It's the fire of my spirit—the fire
of rage. And if you want the key,
you'll have to put out my fire!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Nothing to do but try!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Oh, this is hopeless. Ta!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
My flame grows fiercer! My spirit burns!
I'm grateful to you, but we're not done!
The fight goes OOOOOON!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: I'm still ready to fight!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
That flame reflects your current condition,
doesn't it? I cannae say by what logic it's
operating, but its intensity has weakened,
which proves how much damage you've taken.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Proof? That proves nothing! My heart contains
only rage—rage at the fact I haven't crushed
your damn bones into dust!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Not done... I'm not done...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Oh look! The flame's fading.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: I'll take that key now, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Ta!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
I actually enjoyed that fight—
and I think the fires of my fury
may have been somewhat calmed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: You... You're—!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
We've only a wee bit of time
until the warden gets here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Maybe we could use this well
to our advantage, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
How about we hide in it and wait
for Mr. Bad Bull to run past us?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Nae, I feel like he'd see
right through that plan.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Damn! He caught up to us
while we were thinking.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
No! The hunt can't end this quickly!
Keep running! Make this FUN!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
You think you can defeat me?
That underestimation will cost you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
And there he goes, down the well.
Just like I calculated he would.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
You're amazing, Master! You dodged him
AND looked awesome doing it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Let's go look for the key in
the tower while we can, then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
I expect we've got quite the
dust-up waiting for us here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
We'd best be proper ready
before we break the seal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
No need for worry so long
as we're prepared!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text: So this is the Dark Castle, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! I have fulfilled
my oath and thrown wide the gates of the
Dark Castle! Reveal yourself to us now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
I cannae detect any sort of kingly
presence. Is he really here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
We rid the world of the wardens,
but that doesn't get us any closer
to finding the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Oh dear. I'm sorry I couldn't
be more help to ye, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
I'm FREE! And so is all of Yomi!
Oh, thank you, Master! Thank you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
I'd hoped the Dismal King might know something
about my heart, but if he isn't here, I fear my heart
isn't to be found in this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
I wish to continue serving at your side,
Master! I will help you find your heart!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Is that the Dismal King, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: He's a bit different from how I imagined. ...Okay, a lot different. ...Okay, completely different. But yes. That's him.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! I have fulfilled
my oath and thrown wide the gates of the
Dark Castle! Please grant my reward now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Nae, Dolores, this is dangerous!
We have to get away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: The gate's closed!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
It seems we've no choice but to sort out
the Dismal King. But right now—HIDE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Could it be?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: I'll lend a hand.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Do it! Destroy the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Keep going! Don't give up!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King is no more...
Time for a nap!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Today calls for a banquet!
We'll all eat until we burst!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You people can do as you want,
but I will rule over this castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Not so fast there, snake boy!
I'M the new lord of this world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
A beef-brain like you ruling Yomi?
What a nightmare.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Indeed, a lord must be graceful
and kind—just as I am.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: What's the matter, love?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King is dead.
I know we did out best,
but I still can't believe it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Aye, it was a fight we couldn't avoid.
But even so, I'm sorry for ye.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Oh, I'm totally fine! After all,
I've got YOU, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: I'm not your Master, though.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: And we'll continue on together!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
How could you say something so heartless
when I'm trying so hard to act cheerful?
I hate you, Master! I hate you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Goodness, she DOES hate you, doesn't she!?
How very amusing! Still, this was really
the only way this whole thing could have
turned out, seeing as you have no heart.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Why was Dolores so angry?
I don't understand.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
I imagine you'll understand once you find your heart.
And speaking of, what do you say we get moving
so we can track it down, yes?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: But there's no guarantee I can win.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
If you are going to fight, the four wardens
shall support you. We pray for your victory
over the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Well then, I suppose I'll give it my best.
This is going to be dangerous, though,
so probably best you hide, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Oh my days! The Dismal King
has turned into a baby!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
It appears his power has been reset.
Good! This should return the flow
of darkness to normal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You all sealed away the Dismal King
in order to protect the world, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
WRONG! The watchtower wardens are
the guardians of the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Until the king returns to his former self,
let us entrust his care to the maid here.
I assume she will be fine with this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Oh, that's a brilliant idea!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
If it is your wish, Master,
then I will give my all to
raising the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Be well then, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Are you leaving, Master!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Aye. I came here to find my heart, and thought
the Dismal King might know something about it.
But we've not uncovered even a single clue,
so it's time for me to leave this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
That makes me sad. But I swear to you that I
will fulfill the duty you've entrusted me with.
And if ever you return to this world of Yomi,
I hope you'll take me along with you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: I will, love. Farewell.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Why does this outcome make Dolores so sad?
She seems like the sort of lass who would
enjoy caring for a wee Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You would understand if you had
your heart. Now let us be off.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
I'm sorry I cannae understand your
sadness, Dolores. Pray forgive me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Ooo, you're a happy wittle baby!
Yes you are!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Finally, I am shed of that place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
You two were the ones who brought
me outside of the barrier, yes?
You have my gratitude.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Are ye the Dismal King, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Those who address me usually take a knee
or otherwise show deference, but in light
of your recent good work, I'll overlook it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
The barrier on that castle sealed
my power away—hence why I took
on the form of a baby.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Aye, I've measured all your readings,
and ye don't seem to have the output
level I'd be expecting from a king.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
No. Yet if I can pass beyond the barrier
formed by the watchtowers, I will regain
my true form—but alas, said barrier spans
the entirety of Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
So would ye be able to return to your
original form if ye left this world?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Is such a thing even possible?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Aye, and I can show ye the way.
But first, do ye happen to know
where my heart is?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
A machine's heart? Oh ho! How fascinating.
I would very much like to see such a thing.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
So that's a nae, I take it.
