Well, cheers to ye anyway. Let's head for the graveyard, then.
We can leave this world from there.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
So that's a nae, I take it.
Well, cheers to ye anyway. Let's head for the well, then.
We can leave this world from there.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
The entire fortress is filled with energy.
Where did such power come from?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: It is the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hear me, O king! I, the Warden of Pride,
have fulfilled my sacred vow! Among all
other wardens, I alone have proven worthy
to stand at your side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Don't think I'm quite
following ye there, love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
I did not think you would make it here,
Warden of Pride. Your virtue, after all,
is pride—the selfsame quality which makes
you unable to cooperate with others.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
In your arrogance, you played at being queen,
and gloated overmuch of how you surpassed
all other wardens. But I am the Dismal King!
I need no one at my side!
So while you will never admit to such,
you are not worthy to be my queen.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Still, you have my praise for all you have
done up until this point, for I know it must
have been most arduous for one of your
haughty arrogance... Now begone.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Begone? BEGONE? How DARE you say so to me! You, who were trembling in this castle like a miserable cur until I set you free! But fine. If you can't see my true glory, I'll just get rid of you like I did all of the other wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Nae, that's not why I fought the wardens!
I came all this way for my heart!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Why did ye not tell me this from the
very start, love? Was everything ye
said to me an utter lie, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Not quite. The Warden of Pride—the TRUE Warden
of Pride—coveted the seat of queen and betrayed
the other wardens. But before she could kill them,
she herself was ended instead. I saw this as a good thing overall,
and replaced the warden with this maid.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
But only after entering this castle did she
fully complete the task I had implanted deep
in her mind. So you see, it was not she who
deceived you, but I.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Enough! I am the Warden of Pride,
and I refuse to stand by and let you
claim you somehow manipulated me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Hah!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Urk!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Nnngh...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Now then. As I know you would never
wish for mercy, I will permit you
to perish along with your pride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Nae, stop!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Please don't kill Dolores!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
This is no longer the maid you knew as Dolores,
but the Warden of Pride—and what becomes of
her is for the Dismal King alone to decide.
Now remove yourself from my sight!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hmm... It would seem your determination
is not borne of mere arrogance. Given this,
perhaps it is better for this warden to serve
her master as a maid after all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
M-Master...? I think I...blacked out.
Oof, and everything hurts...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Welcome back, love. The Dismal King
was just offering praise for all the fine
things ye did for him.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
He... He said that about ME?
Oh, but that's wonderful!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Now begone, the both of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Beg pardon, but do ye know
anything about my heart?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
A machine's heart? Oh ho! How fascinating.
I would very much like to see such a thing.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Well, look who finally figured it out...
Oh, but my performance was absolutely
RIVETING, wouldn't you say? And while it wouldn't have been difficult
for me to kill the other wardens alone,
I had to save my strength to topple the
Dismal King here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
And as for you, my king...
Bow your head and beg forgiveness!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
So ye wished to take the
Dismal King's place?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
No! I wanted to be his QUEEN!
None but I possess power and beauty
enough to stand at his side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Well, whether king or queen, I'm hoping
ye know something about my heart.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Aye, I suppose ye wouldn't.
Well, cheers and farewell, then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Wait! Don't just up and leave.
Your heart... Er...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
You'll find it if you fight me!
Yes, that's it! Fight me for it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Ye said a moment ago ye knew nothing about it,
and now ye want to fight? Nae, love, I don't
believe a thing ye say. Please leave me be.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
No! I must grant your wish!
I won't stand for any alternatives!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
This is your heart, then, Dolores?
Aye, but what even IS a heart?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
Probability scans indicate I might be
able to find me heart here, and yet...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
You think you can win against me, Master?
The one who took down the Dismal King?
You should be more worried for your LIFE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
I just don't know.
What even IS a heart!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
This is where I met Dolores.
I was quite surprised at the time.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text: Let's go to the next world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
Ah, the sound of the wind...
Farewell, my lovely Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
The Tower of Wrath's
appearance has changed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
With the Dismal King released, Master,
you are now seeing Yomi's true form—
as well as the true forms of the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text: This is the warden's true form, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
While his appearance and condition
are indeed different from before,
this is the true Warden of Wrath.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I thought a coward like you might steal
treasures in the Dark Castle, but you went
and released the Dismal King instead...
AND NOW YOU'RE GONNA PAY!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
There will be no running this time.
I'll take ye down but good!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Stand down, Warden—unless you are truly
so ignorant of the power I wield?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, I know it well, my king...which is why
I'm gonna stick you back in that castle
and make you a damn baby again!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I must say, you do impress.
It's no mean thing to bring down
the strongest of all wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm relieved we won. Seems he was still
hurting from the incident with the well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
When a wise person wishes to avoid
direct conflict, they employ a detour.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, yes... I sense the presence of some
of my thralls, faint though it may be.
Perhaps they have escaped the wary eyes
of the wardens by hiding in the city? Still, I know they will work themselves
to the bone and beyond for my sake.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I must consider the route ahead before we
press on. It's a big responsibility, it is.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ye claimed your followers would
work to the bone and beyond for ye.
Is that true, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
They cannot disobey my words,
and would never betray me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text: Ye seem quite confident in that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Full glad am I to come face-to-face
with you, my thralls. I must venture across our lands without drawing
the attention of the wardens, that I might
regain my true strength. As such, I would have
you travel ahead and draw their eyes from us.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Just how did ye make them your thralls?
Is it some sort of pact?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text: Care to try it for yourself?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
While I am curious from a data perspective,
I don't think one like myself would be of
much use to ye.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
There were once a full seven watchtowers in Yomi,
each symbolizing one of the virtues of darkness:
pride, greed, envy, wrath, sloth, gluttony,
and lust. Yet some have now been lost forever.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
These ruins—where the Tower of Pride
once stood—are one such instance. Indeed, you served the Warden of Pride,
maid. Do you remember this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I have a vague recollection of working here
a long while ago, but it's...fuzzy. I think it
was from a time before I knew my master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
But if you say it is so, then it must be.
How incredible that you might know so much
about even a base maid like me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends. I have waited long and long for a chance
to hunt the Dismal King, and so followed
you when I heard you left his lair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I pray you will stay out of my way.
This will be best for all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: Nae, I protect the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: The Dismal King is no fiend!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: You're more fool than I imagined!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ye cannae hunt the Dismal King!
Please give up on this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Master! The Dismal King is
surrounded by fiends!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Fear not, for they are my servants,
and will allow us to avoid the
watchtowers. Now hurry aboard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh! Impressive work there, love,
calling forth a vehicle such as this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
You will find your praise unwarranted;
this is far from a gentle ride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text: You had this thing all ready!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
How could you make such
a cruel choice, Master!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
I calculated only a 5 percent chance of defeating
the hunter while still protecting the Dismal King,
so offering the king up to him seemed the best
solution given the situation.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_2.text:
In the end, I wasn't able to find my heart—
and now the Dismal King is gone as well.
It's time for me to leave this world.
Farewell, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
It's always like this: overly indulging
in sloth always leads to the worst of
all possible outcomes. I can't believe you were enough of an idiot
to take the Dismal King out of his castle!
I really should have taken you more 
seriously when first we met...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Ye don't have to force yourself to fight
just because ye regained your true form.
Why not lie back and take a rest instead?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text: True form? Are you half asleep!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Do as she bids, Warden: close the gates
of your tower and go to sleep. Or do
you wish to be subjected to endless
days without rest once more?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
I have a better idea: why don't YOU
go back to the Dark Castle and sleep
as a peaceful little baby? Such sleep is a supreme pleasure only babies
might experience...and it would be a waste
to casually toss such a thing so aside!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Poor dears truly don't realize
their forms have changed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
That's because they haven't
changed—Yomi has.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Will this world change even more
when ye regain your power, love?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
You are not of this land;
what I will does not concern you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text: Aye, but we should confirm anyway.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text:
You are more given to fighting
than I first imagined.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text:
The path cleared for us by my thralls
has been closed. We have no choice
but to fight our way through.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_200_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_SLOTH_200_CUT_000.text:
We already avoided this with my flying
conveyance. There is no need to return
to the Tower of Sloth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_CUT_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lust is freedom, and such a thing runs counter
to command by a regent. Yet because we live in
the world of darkness, we have been ruled by
a king of it. What a contradiction it is.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lust is true darkness, which means we have no
need of a king. Even with the seven watchtowers
reduced to four, we still managed to oppose
your cruel reign and seal you away.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
This form is the true darkness.
The true Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Cast aside your freedom, Warden, for its
lack creates value from desire—and that
is from whence darkness is born.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
It is you who should cast freedom aside,
for the Dismal King ought be the least
liberated of all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
So there's a bit of good
in not being free, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Alas, it is too late. In the end,
I am the only remaining warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Why do ye stand in the
Dismal King's way, love?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
If I could live a life of eating all
that I want, I would be content.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Yet I cannot, for if the Dismal King's
rule is restored, I will be forced to eat
for his sake once more, and all will
again taste as ashes in my mouth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Warden, covet life. You need no purpose.
A reason for living is unnecessary.
Simply hungering for life is the duty
of all subjects of the dark.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
I just want to eat lots of delicious food!
To savor it and not simply throw it down
my gullet like an unthinking machine!
Will you not even allow me that much!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
So eating is the duty of your subjects?
What's the meaning in that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
I eat and eat, but still desire more.
Yet when someone tells me I MUST eat, 
I no longer want to. This is what the
presence of the Dismal King means!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Well, I suppose orders are
meant to be followed...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
It's natural to eat all that one wants,
but being FORCED to eat is different.
It is...wrong.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Eat, Warden. Eat greedily. Such is your
duty as one of the subjects of the dark.
Eat without rest. Eat without pause.
Devote yourself wholly to the act.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
No! I don't want that! That's exactly what
makes me not want to eat! So I'm going to
make YOU eat, and eat, and eeeat!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
The act of eating is the same either way,
so what's different about his wish?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Wardens do not require wills of their own.
They must simply obey my command.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text: It seems I'm the only one left.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Aye, this is the end—but the Dismal King
may grant ye forgiveness, if ye ask.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Forgiveness? There is no such word in the
Dismal King's lexicon. And I also do not wish
it, for desire is unforgivable by nature.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
We seven wardens staked our existence on the
unforgivable act of sealing away the king.
Setting aside the three towers that are lost,
how can any of us seek forgiveness?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ask for my forgiveness, Warden.
The Dismal King alone can grant
you clemency. So ask.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
An invitation so sweet I am seized with the
desire to fall to my knees and kiss your feet.
Indeed, I would entrust my entire body to you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
...But I cannot, for you will simply kick me
while I am on my knees begging forgiveness.
For you are the Dismal King, and even if I
desire you, such lust can never be satisfied.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
I cannae understand their actions.
Perhaps I would if I had my heart?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text: Do not trouble yourself over it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
We've arrived. And you claim we can
reach the world outside Yomi from here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Aye, that's the way of it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Then let us hurry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
That will not come to pass, for it is
your fate to be hunted down by me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: And who are ye?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends. I have waited a long time for a chance
to hunt the Dismal King, and so followed
you when I heard you left his lair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I was worried those awful wardens might get
him first, so I appreciate your safeguarding
him all this way. Thanks to you, my hunt will
surely prove a great success!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: I didn't do this for ye.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
And what exactly are you hoping to accomplish
by taking the Dismal King out of this world?
He lacks anything but the power to bring about
darkness, and his presence benefits none. Instead, let me take him. In this way,
at least my employer and I will benefit.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Nae, I'll not let you have him.
Release the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
You must think me a proper fool!
But no, I'll not let this chance
slip through my fingers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Bah! Nothing will be settled by standing
about staring daggers at each other!
So very well: I will hear your terms.
Begin the negotiation.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
This confrontation could go on for three
thousand hours and it wouldn't be a thing
to me—so talk all ye like.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Damnable cur!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I have not the patience for such!
I'd rather risk getting killed by you
than risk the king escaping!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: What the!? My leg!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Damn you, Dismal King!
You've risen the dead from their graves!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
The dead are surrounding us
as well, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Damn it all—and damn YOU,
Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Is the Dismal King all right!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Milord!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: ...Oh. He's just sleeping.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
It would be quite difficult to take
the Dismal King with me now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Master, I...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Can I entrust him to you, love?
I'm afraid I cannae look after someone.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
If you ask it of me, I will do so gladly.
And in truth, I would be most happy
to serve the Dismal King himself.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Thank ye, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Farewell, Master!
I'll never forget you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Now then...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Let's go, milord.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I'm relieved you managed to get past all
those villainous wardens; you would have
faced defeat had you fought them head-on
like an honest fool. You also have my thanks for getting the king
here safely—it was impressive work. And thanks
to that work, my hunt for the Dismal King will
now prove a great success.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Nae, I cannae let you have him.
Release the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Verbal negotiations are concluded.
Now let my strength speak for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
My prey is the Dismal King alone.
I bid you farewell.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
That hunter really did it...
He captured the Dismal King... Oh, but this is the end of Yomi!
I don't know what I should do...

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Would ye like to come along and
help look for my heart, love?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I would go anywhere so long as
I can be by your side, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Ye cannae hunt the Dismal King!
Please give up on this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text: Then let us go, Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
You have done well to aid me,
maid. Live well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Would ye like to come along and
help look for my heart, love?

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text: Then let's make for the grave!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text: Then let's make for the well!

SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_DIVA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.text:
Yes, well done. Now hurry up
and take me to another world.
